text: They were recently spotted sharing a passionate kiss as they left the GQ Awards in London. And Chrissy Teigen and husband John Legend continued the besotted displays as they attended The Queer Eye Emmy Cast Party hosted by Ketel One Family - Made Vodka at Kimpton La Peer Hotel in West Hollywood, California on Saturday night. The longtime couple looked head over heels as they mingled with Queer Eye stars Karamo Brown, Tan France, Jonathan Van Ness, Bobby Berk and Antoni Porowski at the star - studded bash.
